fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.util.io.clazz
Class ComparableNumbers2NamesAndBack

java.lang.Object
  fr.n7.saceca.u3du.model.util.io.clazz.ComparableNumbers2NamesAndBack

public final class ComparableNumbers2NamesAndBack
extends java.lang.Object

A class to relate (Numeric and Comparable) classes to their short name in a bidirectional way.

Class Short name
java.math.bigDecimal bigDec
java.math.BigInteger bigInt
java.lang.Byte byte
java.lang.Double double
java.lang.Float float
java.lang.Integer int
java.lang.Long long
java.lang.Short short

Author:
Sylvain Cambon
